1.content: I'm frustrated—the app won't sign me in; I get "invalid credentials" even after resetting my password.

The email is example@domain.com, last 4 digits are 1234; after reset I still can't sign in; the app says "account locked."

Resolution: Your account has been unlocked and a new temporary password has been issued. Sign in with the temporary password and set a new one in the app. If you still can't sign in, reinstall the app and try again.

5.content: Satisfied Customer: I'm having trouble with my wireless headphones—they randomly disconnect from my laptop after about a minute, causing audio to drop.

Technical Support Agent: Thanks for the details. Let's try these steps: 1) forget the device and re-pair, 2) update the Bluetooth driver to the latest version, 3) disable Bluetooth power saving in Device Manager, 4) run the Windows Audio Troubleshooter.

6.content: Satisfied Customer: I re-paired the device, updated the driver, and turned off Bluetooth power saving, but the disconnects still happen during playback. It works fine with my phone. Could this be a laptop hardware issue or a warranty problem?
Technical Support Agent: Resolution status: Resolved. The issue was a faulty Bluetooth module; we replaced the module under warranty and the headphones now stay connected with stable audio.
